title: Shadow and Act - primary effect of discussion

content.question: The primary effect of the discussion in the second and third paragraphs is one of

choices.label: immediacy because of the specific imagery
familiarity because of the speaker's strong personal voice
subtle humor because of the contrived nature of the argument
momentary confusion because of the speaker's contradictory loyalties

content.answer: subtle humor because of the contrived nature of the argument

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
